description: This source file is a C program that reads CPU usage information from the /proc/stat file in a Linux-based environment. It includes functions to fetch and calculate CPU utilization, contains a main() entry point, and references some standard libraries and custom error handling macros.

methods.name: int main()
methods.description: Main function that calls getCpuUsage and prints the CPU usage or not available message.

methods.name: int getCpuUsage(char * cpuUtil)
methods.description: Fetches CPU usage from /proc/stat by reading and comparing two samples separated by a sleep interval, then calculates and returns the CPU utilization as a percentage.
